description: Allows configuration of the supported OAuth Flows.

additionalProperties.description: MUST be a valid JSON object serialized as a string, e.g. "{\"key\": \"value\"}". Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().

^x-[\\w\\d\\.\\x2d_]+$.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

anyOf.description: A short description for security scheme.

Configuration for the OAuth Authorization Code flow.
Configuration details for a supported OAuth Flow

additionalProperties.description: MUST be a valid JSON object serialized as a string, e.g. "{\"key\": \"value\"}". Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().

^x-[\\w\\d\\.\\x2d_]+$.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

authorizationUrl.description: The authorization URL to be used for this flow. This MUST be in the form of an absolute URL. Constraints: format: uri.

anyOf.description: The URL to be used for obtaining refresh tokens. This MUST be in the form of an absolute URL. Constraints: format: uri.

scopes.description: The available scopes for the OAuth2 security scheme. A map between the scope name and a short description for it.

tokenUrl.description: The token URL to be used for this flow. This MUST be in the form of an absolute URL. Constraints: format: uri.

anyOf.description:
